data.title: Peter Phillips Music Collections Interview
data.meta_description: Peter Phillips discusses several Renaissance choral performance practice while exploring early music treasures from the Library's music collections, including works by Josquin, Palestrina and the historic "Chansonnier Laborde" from 1470. The interview took place in conjunction with a performance by the Tallis Scholars presented at the Library in 2016.
data.text:

Whenever possible, we provide information that we have about copyright owners and related matters in the catalog records, finding aids and other texts that accompany collections. However, the information we have may not be accurate or complete.
